content.en: Bifurcation analysis: Scientists have developed various algorithms to address different research questions in the field of bifurcation analysis. These algorithms are designed to compute bifurcations in ordinary and partial differential equations, construct global bifurcation diagrams, analyze bifurcation structures, detect bifurcation points, perform numerical bifurcation analysis, and solve nonlinear equations. The algorithms utilize methods such as indirect methods, parametric representation, Liapunov-Schmidt methods, Newton's method, finite element method, asymptotic expansion, characteristic matrices, and Fourier spectral method, among others.
content.da: Forgreninganalyser: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at besvare forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for forgreninganalyser. Disse algoritmer er designet til at beregne forgreninger i almindelige og partielle differentialligninger, konstruere globale forgreningsdiagrammer, analysere forgreningstrukturer, detektere forgreningepunkter, udføre numerisk forgreninganalyse og løse ikke-lineære ligninger. Algoritmerne benytter metoder såsom indirekte metoder, parametrisk repræsentation, Liapunov-Schmidt metoder, Newtons metode, finite element metode, asymptotisk udvidelse, karakteristiske matricer og Fourier spektral metode, blandt andre.
